Title: By Means Which Have Never Yet Been Tried
Plot: The war with Dyad is all but lost when Rachel?s latest ploy forces a broken Sarah to concede. The Clone Club springs into action, uniting in a reckless gambit to save Sarah. As they fight to gain their freedom, Sarah encounters a new ally and uncovers a terrifying new dimension to the conspiracy.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb
